A leash that attaches to the dog's harness and collar, ensuring both hands are free while keeping the dog on a leash.
A non-slip material on the handle reduces the chances of dropping the leash during heavy rain or wet conditions.
LED lights on the leash make the dog more noticeable during nighttime or low visibility situations, providing a safety feature for both the dog and its owner.
A leash with an integrated GPS tracker and alert system to notify the owner if the dog goes out of range or wanders off.
A leash with built-in training features, such as a vibration or electric shock deterrent to encourage good behavior.
